name: Rat Mash
description:
Controls

  • Walk: AD
  • Climb: WS
  • Punch: K
  • Jump / drop down: Space
  • Pause: Esc

Rat Mash is our school project team’s version of the original Rampage. You play as a radioactive rat in a post-apocalyptic world to destroy the leftovers of humanity! You destroy buildings, climb them, and beat your enemies to make your way to the start of it all!

You can also play with a controller! 

Made by: Emma Erjanne, Joona Ljokkoi, Mikko Nystedt, Liisa Pirhonen, Veeti Karilainen and Ville Karilainen.
